profile:
Hi, my name is Ky and here is a quick bio of Bull Tough Flooring Ltd.

I started this company by sanding floors at the weekend and evenings. When the time was right I decided to go solo and start my own company. I started at the bottom with no experience apart from what I'd learned on myself on jobsites. That was the beginning and after years of training here we are ... a small company of 2 people totally dedicated to being the best small company in our field. 

Our field specifically being ... the installation and finishing of site-finished floors, also known as "real" or "solid" hardwood. This includes stairs and the refinishing of any type of hardwood floor.

We've always kept things simple. Customers choose us because we're so easy to work with. The first phone call is all you need to make.

Feel free to contact us with your questions.

Ky
Bull Tough Flooring Ltd
www.bulltough.ca
info@bulltough.ca
403 975 2579
service_area: 95% of our work is in Calgary. We do however offer our services to any customers between Red Deer and High River.
services:
Installation of site-finished hardwood floors and stairs. 
Refinishing of any type of hardwood floor.
name: Bull Tough Flooring Ltd

profile:
Diablo Flooring is a professional hardwood flooring contractor, who provides all types of wood flooring services to Calgary and its neighbouring communities.

We take pride on our commitment to provide the best hardwood flooring services whether it be for a small residential project or a big commercial grade hardwood flooring endeavour.

You can expect a genuine, educated, professional hardwood flooring evaluation and service. Honest and transparent quote for the cost of your wood flooring project. No hidden charges or aggressive sly sales tactics. Only sincere and caring customer service to answer all your hardwood floor concerns.
services:
We provide:
- Hardwood flooring refinishing
- Hardwood flooring installation
- Hardwood flooring maintenance coats
- Hardwood flooring repairs
- Hardwood custom stairs
- Laminate installation & repairs

Welcome to Bellahouse Renovations. I specialize in casing, trim, baseboards, moulding, crown moulding, laminate, hardwood, vinyl flooring installation and I have 5 years experience in this industry. I can work on all size of jobs and provide quality workmanship and great customer services. Quality and Committment are my top priority.

Covid 19 - We're following the health and safety protocals to ensure everyone will be safe - wearing masks, hand sanitizer and practicing social distancing.

profile:
Best Hardwood Floors Ltd is a family owned and operated business established in 1990.
We pride ourselves in providing personalized service, taking the time to review all the details, providing professional recommendations, completing the work in a timely manner, and exceeding your expectations each and every time.
 
From hardwood installation of prefinished or onsite finishing; sanding and staining, different installation methods, you can trust us to do your floor right. If you are looking to refinish a century-old floor, update your kitchen, install hardwood in your basement, or get beautiful hardwood stairs, every project gets the same level of reliable service and detailed attention.
We only use the best materials and tools available in the market and provide virtually dustless equipment, saving time on clean ups.
name: Best Hardwood Floors

profile:
Forest to Floor was founded by Hiro Dobashi. He started his career in hardwood floors in 2011 in Calgary. Forest to Floor is a flooring specialist company, located in Calgary Alberta.

We are experienced and knowledgeable to take care of all of your needs, guaranteeing all workmanship, offering style, and high-standards. Forest to Floor are experts in every aspect of doing your hardwood flooring needs from preparation of sub-floor to installation, sanding, staining, and coating. From the free estimate to the timely completion of your project, we supervise and participate in each and every job so that the outcome is well-controlled. We do it right at the first time. You can depend on us for quality installation, dust-less  floor refinishing, as well as your wood staircase.
Also, we support the ecology movement by suggesting environmentally harmless products such as plant-based oils and waxes and eco-friendly water-based finishes.

- Services

    Hardwood Floor Installation: Unfinished, Pre-finished, Engineered
    Hardwood Floor Refinishing & Resurfacing
    Wood Staircase Installation and Finishing
    Cork Floor Installation
    Sub-floor prep for hardwood flooring

We also sell Japanese knives, sharpen kitchen knives as well
Come to FINE EDGE CUTLERY to check out our selection

https://www.fineedgecutlery.net/#/
name: FOREST TO FLOOR LTD.
